formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Arithmetic series (n terms): \(S_n = \frac{n}{2} [2a_1 + (n - 1)d]\) Arithmetic nth term: \(a_n = a_1 + (n - 1)d\) Geometric series (n terms): \(S_n = a_1 \frac{1 - r^n}{1 - r}, \; r \neq 1\) Infinite geometric series: \(S = \frac{a_1}{1 - r}\) if \(|r| < 1\) Sigma: \(\sum_{n = m}^{k} f(n)\) = evaluate \(f(n)\) at every integer and add.
